title: Play
question: Draw a rectangle around each play being performed.
help: Multiple plays are often performed on the same night, a rectangle should be drawn around each.

title: Title
question: Draw a rectangle around each title (and subtitle) listed.
help: Along with the main performance an additional play will often be performed on the same night, a rectangle should be drawn around the title for each of these.

title: Actor and Role
question: Draw a rectangle around each actor and role listed.
help: single rectangle should be drawn around around each actor and role.

title: Dates
question: Draw a rectangle around the dates of this play, if shown.
help: Each playbill usually gives details on or more plays being performed on a particular date. Dates for any plays being shown on following days can be ignored.
